name: Sound Space (ajsales)
description:
NOTE: Upon starting the game, a Max patch will load in another window. Wait for it to fully load to be able to hear the sound.

This was a final project I submitted for my Sound and Music Computing class. I integrated Max/MSP, a visual programming language used for music composition and audio processing, into Unity as a sort of user interface. Basically, by controlling the player sprite, you change the sound generated by the Max/MSP patch.

Acknowledgements:

Scale function - Jonathan Kulpa

Particle pack - kenney.nl

SaucerBB font - Nate Piekos
